programme.title: Tour European Rally Historic
programme.desc: The Tour European Rally Historic is a brand new independent rally series that made its debut in 2019. It offers an exciting mix of great rallies and outstanding venues.

programme.title: Rally Montre, Japan
programme.desc: Tour European Rally is an up-and-coming rally series that combines some of Europe's most breathtaking and challenging rally events into one pan-European rally series. Each season consists of 5-6 individual events, plus annual TER promo events.

programme.title: Rallye : Championnat du monde
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Kaiafas Battle
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Rallye de la Route de la Soie
programme.desc: Silk Way Rally is an annual rally raid type of off-road race. The first Silk Way Rally was raced in 2009 from Kazan, Russia to Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. The rally has three categories - moto, cars and trucks. It is one of the biggest rally-raid competitions in the world, and it is traditionally held in mid-summer. In less than two weeks the rally route crosses the territory of several different countries.

programme.title: Championnat de Belgique des Rallyes
programme.desc: The Belgian Rally Championship is one of the most fiercely contested rally championships at a national level. It also attracts prominent guest entrants such as Thierry Neuville, Craig Breen and Stéphane Lefebvre.

programme.title: Arctic Lapland Rally - A Tour European Rally Promo Event
programme.desc: Organised as a promo event by the TER, the Artic Lapland Rally is the coldest rally competition in the world. Despite temperatures dropping to -35°C, the rally attracts more than 200,000 spectators to Rovaniemi, the capital of Finnish Lappland. It's hated, but also loved among the 150 drivers taking part every year. MOTORVISION TV shows you the highlights from the 2020 Arctic Lapland Rally.

programme.title: Car History (BMW) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «BMW»If there is a typical BMW, then it is the BMW 3 Series. It is fast, it is a cult, and it is the epitome of the sports sedan. Since its debut in 1975 the BMW 3 Series is the undisputed leader in the premium segment and the right car for every need: It is a family-limousine, sports car, tuning and racing car. Car History recounts all the models and reveals the whole story of the BMW 3 Series.

programme.title: Car People (Pirelli Tuning Award) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Pirelli Tuning Award»Extreme lacquering, chrome-plated wheel rims and lots of monitors. Annually the elite of the screwing scene attends the Pirelli Tuning Award.

programme.title: Monster Tuning
programme.desc: The Monza Rally Show is a true classic amongst drifting shows. Since 1978 motorsport stars meet on the legendary Formula One course in the Italian city of Monza and hold onto the fly-off lever. Patron and MOTOGP star Valentino Rossi and his guests offer the fans an unforgettable show. Also on this episode: The Mercedes G-Class becomes a special off-road vehicle 'ORC Bull'. No part of this ultimate hunting vessel for the toughest terrain remains untouched. Plus: A Mini gets turned into a racing car for the Rally Dakar. Rally pro StephanÃ© Peterhansel explains the basics of race tuning, when he shows his Mini Rally-Countryman.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The Road to Racing.

programme.title: Tandragee Races Part 2
programme.desc: King of the Roads.

programme.title: Dream Cars S1
programme.desc: Whether it is the Porsche 918 Spyder, the Audi R8, the Mercedes AMG GT or the BMW i8: German supercars are the fastest, most spectacular and most coveted supercars of the world with breathtaking top speeds and unbelievable engine powers. They not only drive ahead because of their unique performance, but they also set the standards, when it comes to design and innovative technology. DreamCars presents the most exciting and fastest German supercars.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Exciting sports show that follows the hottest action from the world's most unique motor sport events. Viewers will have a chance to visit some interesting competitions- from IDEMITSU 600 Super Endurance at the Chang Interna-tional Circuit in Thailand, the winter edition of the Maroc Challenge in Morocco, to the Hispania Rally, the only European rally to take place in the desert, and many more. Viewers will also find out all the news from the world of motor sports.

programme.title: Go Green! S1
programme.desc: This is Go Green, and we are riding the wave of the future. No more red lights, no more traffic jams. Audi calls this Travolution and we'll try it out.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bike World is the magazine on MOTORVISION TV for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S4
programme.desc: A widely spread prejudice against electric cars is that they are not suitable for everyday life due to their short driving range and long charging times. But statistics from Germany show that drivers don't travel more than 100 kilometers a day, so there shouldn't be a problem. Perfect Ride tests if the VW e-up! and Renault Zoe are suitable for everyday life, when radio and heater are running, too.

programme.title: MotorStories (Rock 'n Race Festival Berlin) (n°7)
programme.desc: «Rock 'n Race Festival Berlin»Frank Slopianka is a total speed junkie and constantly takes part in racing events. US car fans Kati and Patrick join him for the Race 61, a rock and race festival in Finowfurt near Berlin. There Frank and and his 700 hp Dragster Camaro take part in the 1/8 mile race on the air strip of the aviation museum. He is determined to defend his title against tough opponents from all over Europe.

programme.title: Made in Germany (Seat) S3 (n°46)
programme.desc: «Seat»Martorell near the Mediterranean city of Barcelona is the home of Seat's largest production plant. Vehicles have been produced here since 1950. Today, half a million cars per year are produced on an area of almost three million square meters. The plant is considered to be one of the most advanced in Europe. 14,000 employees, industry 4.0, human-machine collaboration and an army of over 2,000 robots are deployed here. ""Made in Spain"" takes a look behind the scenes of Seat.

programme.title: Kissling Motorsport
programme.desc: Green hell.

programme.title: Car History (Mercedes S-Class) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Mercedes S-Class»Since the 1950s the Mercedes S-Class has been the epitome of luxury, comfort and safety. The S-Class sets the standard for prestige and technology. Every model is a bestseller; every model becomes a status symbol of the rich and powerful. Car History tells the story of this "special class" that prevails against any crises, social changes and its competition.

programme.title: Car People (The Car Whisperer) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «The Car Whisperer»Boizenburg - one hour to the south of Hamburg. On an old factory property pile up old US cars, wrecks and quaint conversions. This is the territory of Ingo Sillus, a hard rocker, Harley driver und US fan.

programme.title: Tuning Expo Saarbrucken, Germany
programme.desc: Extreme, more extreme, Tuning Expo! Already for the eight time an event of a class of its own takes place in Saarbrucken. For the fair in the border triangle all the European bolides come along.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The Road to Racing.

programme.title: Tandragee Races Part 1
programme.desc: King of the Roads.

programme.title: BitCiMXGP of Turkey, Afyonkarahisar
programme.desc: The FIM Motocross World Championship - also known as the MXGP - is the premier championship of motocross racing. In 2022, the championship and will be contested over 18 rounds in Europe, the Middle East, Asia and South America. Motorvision.TV takes viewers behind the scenes of every single event, presents interviews with all drivers and shows the most exciting moments from every weekend.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Andorra, Sant Julia
programme.desc: It's time for the third and penultimate round of the 2020 FIM Trial World Championship. Contenders for the Trial GP title travel to Sant Julia de Loria in Andorra, where they try to beat one of the toughest courses of the season.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Germany, Riesa, SachsenArena
programme.desc: FIM SuperEnduro World Championship has been held since 2007. Its circuits are built inside stadiums or arenas, recreating obstacles such as rocks, boulders and logs. The championship consists of eight Grands Prix spread around the globe on courses that are mostly off-road. These events are split into two days and two different races, after which the points towards the world championship are awarded. Each round includes a motocross test and an extreme test, in addition to the enduro test.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Australian Superbike Championship
programme.desc: Founded in 1980, the Australian Superbike Championship is one of the most important motorcycle racing competitions in Oceania. It is well respected as a springboard for riders and teams who aspire an international career in motorcycling. The 2022 season is contested in five classes: Superbike, Supersport, Supersport 300, the Yamaha R3 Cup and the Oceania Junior Cup.

programme.title: Enduro - Red Bull Romaniacs
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs is known for being the hardest Enduro Rally in the world. If you make it here you count yourself amongst the world's toughest enduro drivers. In 2019, the event acts as the fifth stop of the World Enduro Super Series and provides brilliant off-road action in the wilderness of Romania. MOTORVISION TV shows the best moments in this highlight recap.

programme.title: Car History (AMG) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «AMG»AMG - three letters that quicken your pulse. From the very beginning, AMG has been specialized in improving performance for Mercedes cars. It is the embodiment of automotive performance, exclusivity and dynamic driving pleasure. Car History details AMG's growth from its humble beginnings as an independent engineering firm to being a world renowned company owned by Mercedes-Benz.

programme.title: Car People (The Towing Company) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Towing Company»Cars which stop driving, are their business. It doesn't matter if it was an accident or a parking offence: Non-moving cars have to be disposed of. It's a case for the breakdown service as they tidy up on the road.

programme.title: Porsche Is a Religion
programme.desc: Porsche is a religion. The persuasions are: punk, tech and race. Porsche punk, collector and tuner Magnus Walker is the face of this movement. He preaches individualism for historic cars. Tech is personified by Alois RUF since 1983. As an manifestation of the tech movement, the RUF RT 35, which is based on the Porsche Turbo, puts an additional 70 hp to the streets. And Porsche itself has the ultimate track tool for the racers amongst the believers. GT3 RS is the codeword in order to be allowed entry to the motorsports paradise once and for all.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The Road to Racing.

programme.title: NW200 Races Part 1
programme.desc: King of the Roads.

programme.title: Australian V8 Superboats Championship
programme.desc: The Australian V8 Superboat Championship is one of the most important watersports series from down under. Drivers compete in three different classes: the LS Class, Group A and Unlimited, which features hardly any restrictions regarding engine sizes. In 2022, a total of seven rounds are scheduled before a new champion is crowned.

programme.title: Powerboat: P1 USA AquaX Championship
programme.desc: See all the action from the USA series of P1 AquaX, an exciting Jet Ski racing event, operated by Powerboat P1. P1 AquaX is an international motorboat racing competition organised by the Union Internationale Motornautique.

programme.title: P1 Offshore Championship
programme.desc: The P1 Offshore Powerboat Championship promises tightly fought offshore racing with powerboats reaching top speeds of up to 100 miles per hour. Five events are schedules for the 2022 season and Motorvision.TV brings you all the thrilling action from each event!

programme.title: Motonautisme : Championnat du monde de Formule 1
programme.desc: In 2022, the UIM is once again hosting its Formula 1 World Championship in Powerboat. In the 37th season, ten teams with 19 drivers from eleven countries have signed up to fight for the title of the new world champion in three Grand Prix.

programme.title: UIM Aquabike World Championship
programme.desc: Caution, danger of splashing! Since 1992, the Aquabike World Championship has been the most important racing series in the sport of jet skiing and one of the fastest competitions in water sports. On specially designed race courses or on the high seas, the participants engage in thrilling races in the ski and runabout categories and fascinate with all kinds of stunts on their more than 300 hp jet skis.

programme.title: Whanganui, Shelterview, Neuseeland
programme.desc: The New Zealand Jetsprint Championship is the most important sprint boat competition from New Zealand, the country where the sport was founded in 1981. Jetsprinting is comparable to rally sports, but there is only one boat on the track at any given time and boats drive at very high speeds. The up to 500 HP strong jet sprint boats therefore try to achieve the best time on the tracks.

programme.title: British Truck Racing
programme.desc: The Brisith Truck Racing Championship features some of the heaviest racing machines you'll ever see. Each truck weighs more than five tonnes and produces in excess of 1000bhp. The 2022 season features a total of 7 events that are contested around the United Kingdom.

programme.title: British Truck Racing
programme.desc: The Brisith Truck Racing Championship features some of the heaviest racing machines you'll ever see. Each truck weighs more than five tonnes and produces in excess of 1000bhp. The 2022 season features a total of 7 events that are contested around the United Kingdom.
